articles.author: WILL WEISSERT, CHRIS MEGERIAN
articles.title: Harris promises to 'represent all Americans' after Biden's remark on Trump supporters and 'garbage' - The Associated Press
articles.description: Kamala Harris is calling for Americans to “stop pointing fingers at each other” as she tries to push past comments made by President Joe Biden about Donald Trump’s supporters and “garbage.” Harris made her pitch in Raleigh, North Carolina, at the first of thr…
articles.content: RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) Kamala Harris called Wednesday for Americans to stop pointing fingers at each other as she tried to push past comments made by President Joe Biden about Donald Trumps supporters an… [+5115 chars]
